title: Andrea Mitchell: Fidel Castro wasn't as threatening as Don Regan
description: Celebrating 40 years at NBC News, Chief Foreign Affairs Correspondent Andrea Mitchell joins Chuck to look back on highlights from her career, including the time she called out Castro for skipping an interview.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
